ol.li: SHALL conform to Level Two Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20)
SHALL conform to Level One Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10)
SHALL conform to Level Two Conformance template (templateId: 2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20)
Contains exactly one [1..1] typeId, where its data type is InfrastructureRootTypeId
Contains exactly one [1..1] id, where its data type is II
Contains exactly one [1..1] code, where its data type is CE
Contains exactly one [1..1] effectiveTime, where its data type is TS
Contains exactly one [1..1] confidentialityCode, where its data type is CE
Contains at least one [1..*] recordTarget, where its type is Record Target
Contains at least one [1..*] author, where its type is Author
Contains exactly one [1..1] custodian, where its type is Custodian
Contains exactly one [1..1] component, where its type is Component2

body.codeblock: <?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?> <ClinicalDocument xmlns:xsi="http://www.w3.org/2001/XMLSchema-instance" xmlns="urn:hl7-org:v3" xsi:schemaLocation="urn:hl7-org:v3 CDA.xsd"> <typeId root="2.16.840.1.113883.1.3"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.10"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.20"/> <templateId root="2.16.840.1.113883.10.20.30"/> <id root="1596821608"/> <code code="Value"/> <title/> <effectiveTime/> <confidentialityCode code="Value"/> <recordTarget> <patientRole/> </recordTarget> <author> <time/> <assignedAuthor/> </author> <custodian/> <component/> </ClinicalDocument>
